comments.body:
This exception will be raised also when the state is CANCELLED. For that reason I'd change the message to:
```suggestion
                f"finished in `{state}` state",
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +103,107 @@            raise AirflowException(
                f"Execution {self.execution_id} for workflow {self.execution_id} "
                f"failed and is in `{state}` state",
            )

comments.body:
```suggestion
            "Execution %s for workflow %s hasn't completed yet, current state: %s",
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +116,120 @@
        self.log.info(
            "Execution %s for workflow %s does not completed yet, current state: %s",
            self.execution_id,
            self.workflow_id,
